benchmark_details.name: Question and Answer Dataset with common knowledge of Synonyms (QADS)
benchmark_details.overview: QADS is designed to evaluate machine comprehension models' ability to handle commonsense knowledge of synonyms, generated from SQuAD 2.0 and adversarial challenges.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To investigate the ability of NLP models to handle commonsense knowledge of synonyms as part of machine comprehension.

data.source: Generated from SQuAD 2.0 dataset using WordNet and enhanced Lesk algorithm.
data.annotation: Crowdsourced verification from native English speakers.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on correct answers against total questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of models in understanding commonsense synonyms.
methodology.validation: Evaluated by fine-tuning models on SQuAD 2.0 and cross-validation on QADS.
